lines.text:
[to a pleading Billy]
Justice, ain't about bringing back the dead, white man. Justice, is about justice. Your friend the policeman, your friend the judge, they make sure nothing happen to you. They keep you safe. But I make sure something happen to them. That justice, white man. Gypsy justice!
This diet you're on, what is it? I've tried all the others, I might as well try this one.
I don't think you'd like it Henry. In fact, I don't think you'd like it at all.
He was a mook, but he was my mook!

[tadzu gives Billy the gypsy pie that 2n lift his curse]
Okay. You gain weight now. So quick you don't know what's going on. But, somebody, got to eat this pie, and soon. Everyone who eat pie die quick and bad. You got somebody?
Yes.
Yeah, you got somebody.
[He starts to leave but stops]
But why you don't do right? Eat your own pie. You die thin, but you die clean.
Get away from me. Our business is done.

[Pleadingly]
Die clean, white man from town. Die clean...

[to his dead and extremely emaciated wife]
Look at you, size six again. Maybe even a size four.
[Sniggers]
What are you trying to do to me?
What you wanted me to do in the back seat of your daddy's car. Prove my love to you.

[about the curse]
I never take it off. I die with it in my mouth.
[last lines]
Dr. Mikey! A bit early for a house call, isn't it?
Oh, Billy! It's- it's not what you think! I...

It's okay, Dr. Mikey. I was acting like kind of a big jerk. But, everything's fine with Heidi, I'm even starting to gain a little weight. In fact, I was just about to dig into this breakfast pie. Care to join me?
I couldn't possibly...
Oh, it's no trouble at all...
[enters the house]
...white doctor from town.
[chuckles and shuts door]
I don't do nothing that goes on video.
Richie, this is getting out of hand!
No, this has BEEN out of hand, and I'm just the guy to put it back *in* hand.

[about Lempke's daughter]
Oh, what the hell. Old lady was jaywalking!

[about Billy]
Your friend is a pig! And he will die thin!
[about Richie]
But you will die first, you... bastard!
Billy, you've got to stop eating like that. I want you to stop digging your grave with a spoon and fork.
So, gonna go to New Haven today to get Mr. Mafia off?
I told you not to call him that. It's bad enough that your father is defending him, jokes I can do without.

[doing a Marlon Brando impression]
You say this is justice? This is not justice.
Keep it up and I'll take your video card away.

[scoffs]
You would not!

[doing a Marlon Brando impression]
Try me, sweetheart!
I'm glad you two think this is so funny!

[doing a Marlon Brando impression]
There's my ride. I go to Earth Science.
I can't help it, Heidi. All I ever think about is... food!
Well, maybe I can try to help you think about something...
[sticks her hand into Billy's pants]
else. Still thinking about food?
Sir?
[brushes Billy's cheek with his palm]
Thinner...
You like this don't you, Richie?
Like it? You kiddin' me? I fuckin' love it!
[laughs]
Does anybody know this man?
[holds up picture of Tadzu Lempke]

Yeah. How could you miss him? That big old black cancer right in the middle of his face? I used to work the ferris wheel a few years ago. The last time I saw Lempke, he looked me in the eye and said "Hey, how that pretty little wife of yours? Aaw, don't matter, 'cause you'll see her soon!
[looks terrified and grabs Billy]
Mister, my wife's been dead for five years! And he knew it!

[gulps]
Uh, did you see which way they went?
They went up the coast.
Thanks.
[starts to leave]
Hey, mister, you'd better watch out That old Lempke will chew you up and swallow you down.

[angrily yelling]
Shame... on momma! I say, you killed my own momma!
I say, you are a demon, and we should kill YOU!
That is what I am to you? A demon?

[pulls up his shirt and shows his belly]
Look at me.

[spitting between fingers]
Gachumilalah!
[walks away]

[gently pushes Gina and walks forward to Billy]
Sey call you de white man from town. You have no business with us, white man from town. And we have no business with you. Go away!
Tusom gaza, pappa.
I am not through with you... Your daughter... ran up between two parked cars... I couldn't see her.
Why wasn't you watching, white man from town. Why wasn't you watching?
[pissed off]
You never SEE us!
Chang!
[walks away]

[mockingly imitating]
Chaang!
[At the faire... ]

Don't you bother to step on this scale, mister. I can tell your weight from right here 1-5-9 right? And next week goin' be 1-4-3. And the week after that? Hoo-oo! We don't wanna to think about it, mister, do we?
[wheezing]
Sorry, mister... but you lose.
[walks to the dolls]
But let's see...
[moves the fingers near the dolls, and stop at the doll, presenting Billy, whispering]
Aah... this...
[looking back at Billy]
You can have a prize anyway.
[throws the doll to Billy and gets her catapult]
AAAAAAH!
[runs after Billy]
[still wheezing]
Richie, you're not going to hurt anybody, are you?
No. But Billy, if I'm gonna help you with this, you don't get to ask that question again.
Alright I'll go. But before I go, I curse YOU! The Curse of the White Man from Town!
